scripts.prepare:bsc: mustache ./config/bsc.json template.yaml > subgraph.yaml; mustache ./config/bsc.json src/contract_utils.template.ts > src/contract_utils.ts;graph build
scripts.prepare:fantom: mustache ./config/fantom.json template.yaml > subgraph.yaml; mustache ./config/fantom.json src/contract_utils.template.ts > src/contract_utils.ts;graph build
scripts.prepare:fantom_test: mustache ./config/fantom_test.json template.yaml > subgraph.yaml; mustache ./config/fantom_test.json src/contract_utils.template.ts > src/contract_utils.ts;graph build
scripts.prepare:base: mustache ./config/base.json template.yaml > subgraph.yaml; mustache ./config/base.json src/contract_utils.template.ts > src/contract_utils.ts;graph build
scripts.prepare:fantom_batchLiq: mustache ./config/fantom_batchLiq.json template.yaml > subgraph.yaml; mustache ./config/fantom_batchLiq.json src/contract_utils.template.ts > src/contract_utils.ts;graph build
